name: Monster Shave Salon Makeover Free - For fans of Santa Claus, Frankenstein, The Mummy & Dracula
name_original: Monster Shave Salon Makeover Free - For fans of Santa Claus, Frankenstein, The Mummy & Dracula
description:
Did you know that Frankenstein, Dracula, The Mummy and Santa Claus all need a shave once in a while? Well you do now, and this is the game that gives you that opportunity!

Featuring awesome graphics, addictive game-play, and the ability to shave some of the most iconic characters around!

Use realistic tools such as razors & electric trimmers!

Use hair-grow (in lots of colors!) to grow more beards!

Use bandages to heal spots & rash cream to stop rashes!

...Use after-shave, but be careful, it can hurt them!

When you are finished, why not share your fantastic result using the inbuilt twitter and email function, or simply save it to your device to show off at a later date!

So come on over to the Spooky Shavers salon, they are waiting for you!
